result.description:
Transforms Declarative Actions data pertinent to Playbooks, Playbook Stages, and Playbook Cards with subsequent DA fetch.  

For Playbook actions, pass "16f2aef6c32110109b1204186e40dd7f" to the DA Model field.
For Stage actions, pass "61cd5e20c30210109b1204186e40ddb0" to the DA Model field.
For Card actions, pass "ca57d12e730333004a905ee515f6a7b2" to the DA Model field.

            "name": "configurationId",
            "label": "List Menu Configuration ID",
            "fieldType": "string",
            "valueType": "string",
            "readOnly": false,
            "mandatory": false,
            "description": "The ID of the configuration from sys_ux_list_menu_config table you want to populate the list menu with."
        },
        {
            "name": "currentPage",
            "label": "Current Page",
            "description": "Current Page",
            "readOnly": "false",
            "fieldType": "number",
            "mandatory": false,
            "defaultValue": 0
        },  
        {
            "name": "enableCellFiltering",
            "label": "Enable cell filtering",
            "description": "Enables the ability to access the cell filter popover to filter cells by 'show matching' and 'filter out'",
            "readOnly": false,
            "fieldType": "boolean",
            "mandatory": false,
            "defaultValue": true
        },
        {
            "name": "childQuery",
            "label": "Child query",
            "description": "Query based on which children are fetched when nestBy property is set",
            "readOnly": false,
            "fieldType": "string",
            "mandatory": false,
            "defaultValue": ""
        },
        {
            "name": "enableColumnSorting",
            "label": "Enable column sorting",
            "description": "Enables the ability to sort a list by clicking on the column header",
            "readOnly": false,
            "fieldType": "boolean",
            "mandatory": false,
            "defaultValue": true
        },
        {
            "name": "currentPageForChild",
            "label": "Current Page for Child",
            "description": "Maintains the pagination data for children",
            "readOnly": false,
            "fieldType": "number",
            "mandatory": false,
            "defaultValue": 0
        }, 
        {
            "name": "enableDeclarativeActions",
            "label": "Enable declarative actions",
            "description": "When enabled, declarative actions will be fetched and displayed in an action bar in the header",
            "readOnly": false,
            "fieldType": "boolean",
            "mandatory": false,
            "defaultValue": true
        },
        {
            "name": "enableQuickEdit",
            "label": "Enable quick edit",
            "description": "The quick edit feature allows you to click on a row action icon to open up a panel in which you can edit the associated record",
            "readOnly": false,
            "fieldType": "boolean",
            "mandatory": false,
            "defaultValue": true
        },
        {
            "name": "enableReferenceLinks",
            "label": "Enable reference links",
            "description": "When enabled, reference field links will be active",
            "readOnly": false,
            "fieldType": "boolean",
            "mandatory": false,
            "defaultValue": true
        },
        {
            "name": "enableLiveList",
            "label": "Enable live list",
            "description": "This feature will be usable only if the system property \"glide.lists.live_list_enabled\" is turned on. When it's on, this property allows users to subscribe to live list updates from the list header. However, if they subscribe to these updates, it may slow down their experience.",
            "readOnly": false,
            "fieldType": "boolean",
            "mandatory": false,
            "defaultValue": false
        },
        {

            "label": "Enable infinite scrolling",
            "description": "When enabled, users can scroll infinitely through the list instead of using pagination",
            "readOnly": false,
            "fieldType": "boolean",
            "mandatory": false,
            "defaultValue": false
        },

            "mandatory": false,
            "defaultValue": ""
        }

result.description: Return the records that meet the search criterion. To set up you will need a table name and conditions to filter suitable records from that tale.
result.props:
[
  {
  "name": "table",
  "label": "Table",
  "description": "Table to look up",
  "readOnly": false,
  "fieldType": "table_name",
  "mandatory": true,
  "defaultValue": ""
},
{
  "name": "encodedQuery",
  "label": "Conditions",
  "description": "Look up search conditions",
  "readOnly": false,
  "fieldType": "condition_string",
  "mandatory": false,
  "defaultValue": "",
  "typeMetadata": {
        "table": "@table"
  }
},
{
  "name": "returnFields",
  "label": "Return fields",
  "description": "Returned field values",
  "readOnly": false,
  "fieldType": "field_list",
  "mandatory": false,
  "typeMetadata": {
        "table": "@table",
        "variant": "ordered"
  }
},
{
  "name": "orderBy",
  "label": "Order by",
  "description": "Field to sort rows by",
  "readOnly": false,
  "fieldType": "field",
  "mandatory": false,
  "typeMetadata": {
        "table": "@table"
}
},
{
  "name": "sortType",
  "label": "Sort type (asc/desc)",
  "description": "Sort type",
  "readOnly": false,
  "fieldType": "string",
  "mandatory": false,
  "defaultValue": "asc",
  "typeMetadata": {
        "choices": [{"label": "a to z", "value": "asc" },{"label": "z to a", "value": "desc" }]
  }
},
{
  "name": "limit",
  "label": "Max results",
  "description": "Maximum results returned.\nNOTE: The property has a default upper-cap of 1000. To modify the upper-cap, create/update the system-level property `glide.graphql.gliderecord.maxResults.limit` and set the desired upper-cap.",
  "readOnly": false,
  "fieldType": "string",
  "mandatory": false,
 "defaultValue": "1000"
},
{
  "name": "offset",
  "label": "Pagination offset",
  "description": "Pagination offset",
  "readOnly": false,
  "fieldType": "string",
  "mandatory": false
},
  {
  "name": "queryCategory",
  "label": "Query category",
  "description": "Read replica query category",
  "readOnly": false,
  "fieldType": "string",
  "mandatory": false,
  "defaultValue": ""
},
{
  "name": "returnFieldMetadata",
  "label": "Return field metadata",
  "description": "Return field metadata",
  "readOnly": false,
  "fieldType": "boolean",
  "mandatory": false,
  "defaultValue": false
}
]
